## TooltipComponent.registerHoverEvents() method

Registers handlers that allows reaction to entering or leaving tooltip

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerHoverEvents(enter: () => void, leave: () => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  enter | () =&gt; void | Called when mouse enter tooltip component, hover |
|  leave | () =&gt; void | Called when mouse leaves tooltip component |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
